activities: HireIQ Solutions markets and sells certain software products to companies for the purpose of screening and assessing potential employees for those companies. As such it collects, on its client's behalf, certain limited personally identifiable information about the employment candidate. This information is provided either by the candidate himself through a registration process, or programmatically by HireIQ's client expressly for the purpose of administering an online assessment or test.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Services - (CSV)Computer Software - (CSF)Films Videos & Other Recordings - (FLM)
personaldata: HireIQ collects and stores applicant name, e-mail address, telephone number, and voice recordings. In addition, HireIQ collects and stores name and e-mail addresses of users of the software system.
privacyprograms: Self-regulatory program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
recoursemech: Any dispute resolution or unresolved complaints will be  be in accordance with the commercial rules of Judicial Arbitration and Mediation Services ("JAMS") in effect at the time the dispute is filed.
